sections.title: Getting Around NYC
sections.summary: The subway is the fastest way to move around the city, with safe alternatives depending on time and comfort.
bullets: Subway: reliable, fast, and safe during the day.
Buses: great for above‑ground views and short distances.
Rideshare: ideal for late‑night travel or unfamiliar areas.
Walking: Manhattan is extremely walkable — stick to main avenues after dark.
